caption.body: To celebrate International Women’s Day, our Video Arts program is presenting four shorts by women filmmakers from four parts of the world, including Aukland-based Felicity Morgan-Rhind. Morgan-Rhind has crafted an endearing profile of Fay and Joe Gock, who found an unlikely but enduring way to repay the country that granted them citizenship after escaping Japanese-occupied China in the 1940s. See "How Mr and Mrs Gock Saved the Kumara" and three other shorts now playing in the Video Arts screening room located pre-security in the International Terminal Main Hall. http://bit.ly/2SSpQVW
